description.displayText: Susana was an absolute pleasure to work with. Truly wonderful, and cannot say enough good things. We had her care for our 11 month old for 1 week, and she was great. We've already hired her again for another last minute emergency.
description.originalText: Susana was an absolute pleasure to work with. Truly wonderful, and cannot say enough good things. We had her care for our 11 month old for 1 week, and she was great. We've already hired her again for another last minute emergency.

description.displayText: I hired Susana on an emergency basis on Care.com because my daughter's nanny abruptly went to Zimbabwe for a funeral. I was terrified because my 3 year old has only had one nanny. However, Susana is phenomenal. My 3 year old daughter loves her. Susana has already taken initiative and reached out to other nanny's of my daughter's friends and arranged play dates. Susana is kind, approachable, amazing with kids, punctual, and takes self initiative. She's been very careful with my daughter given COVID. She would be a benefit to any family seeking child care. She has my highest recommendation.
